entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
